name: A little girl
description:
Disclaimer: The above trailer is not for a little girl but a different game I'm working on called project gears. If you wish to support me, you can on patreon at

https://www.patreon.com/Brightlightstudios 

Thanks a lot.

Hero, welcome to my page. There's a little girl that needs your help. She's from another dimension and she doesn't know how to get back. You, hero, you have to save her. Cause I ain't doing it I got games to make man.

anyway here are your instructions:

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

AD TO MOVE LEFT AND RIGHT

W TO JUMP OR SPACE BAR

MOVE TOWARDS A WALL AND PRESS W TO WALL JUMP

R TO RESTART THE LEVEL

AND G TO GRAB YOUR ACOLYTE WHICH WILL HELP YOU GET HER HOME

REMEMBER THE ACOLYTE DOES NOT RESPOND TO GRAVITY

XBOX CONTROLLER CONTROLS:

D-PAD LEFT AND RIGHT TO MOVE LEFT AND RIGHT

D-PAD UP TO JUMP

MOVE TOWARDS A WALL AND PRESS D-PAD UP TO WALL JUMP

PRESS A TO GRAB THE ACOLYTE

PRESS START TO RESTART THE LEVEL, SEE WHAT I DID THERE

THE CONTROLS ARE THE SAME FOR THE NINTENDO JOY CON(B to grab, + to restart the level) IF YOU CAN SOME WAY GET THAT TO WORK ON YOUR PC.

PS4 CONTROLLER D-PAD MOVEMENT IS THE SAME BUT TO GRAB IS CROSS DUNNO TEST IT OUT AND FIND OUT AND PRESS OPTIONS TO RESTART THE LEVEL.

Good luck

 YOU'LL NEED IT!!
